sys_script_include.name: lmsAjax

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_9cf7091c971671106823f5c11153af8b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1129234_lms.lmsAjax</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>lmsAjax</name><script><![CDATA[var lmsAjax = Class.create();
lmsAjax.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    getDateDiff: function() {
        var d1 = new GlideDate();
        d1.setDisplayValue(this.getParameter('sysparm_start'));
        var d2 = new GlideDate();
        d2.setDisplayValue(this.getParameter('sysparm_end'));
		
		var duration = GlideDate.subtract(d1,d2);
		return duration.getNumericValue();
    },
    type: 'lmsAjax'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>fred.luddy</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-31 11:58:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>9cf7091c971671106823f5c11153af8b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>lmsAjax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Leave Management" source="x_1129234_lms">27b64184975631106823f5c11153af85</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Leave Management">27b64184975631106823f5c11153af85</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9cf7091c971671106823f5c11153af8b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>fred.luddy</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-31 12:02:01</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
